snippet.title: Bloodborne Kart: Central Yharnam Roadway
snippet.description:
Music by The Noble Demon: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pV6UDtl9ylI
Follow on Twitter for daily updates: https://twitter.com/b0tster

Happy to show off a touched up and polished version of the original april fools track present in the video that went viral and inspired me to actually continue this project! On top of that there has been a lot of feature updates and additions, including:

➡ Power ups will now properly roulette before being granted; the player can even hold the button down to 'grind' the roulette and slow it down, meaning they can potentially predict what power up to get if the player has a good memory of the roulette loop and quick reflexes!

➡ The power ups that get added to the roulette is determined by the players position in the race, meaning that the further back they are the more powerful the power ups they could potentially get!

➡ There is now a minimap, which can display off screen power ups activating (like the delayed rope molotov mines!)

➡ Players now have health that can be managed by the blood vial power up. When a racer dies, they drop a recovery bloodstain that can be picked up by any racer! (Reminder that Blood Echoes raise the players top speed, as signified by the red needle)

➡ There is now a proper 'post race' menu that shows the results of the race, and any winnings. Insight will unlock future races and Blood Echoes will be used to buy things like karts!

Thank you so much for checking this video out! See you next time!
